fields.name: agentName
fields.label: Agent Name
fields.description: Logical name for the core agent.

fields.name: logLevel
fields.label: Log Level
fields.description: Logging verbosity (e.g. debug, info, warn, error).

fields.name: memoryLimitMB
fields.label: Memory Limit (MB)
fields.description: Maximum memory usage before throttling or shutdown.

fields.name: concurrency
fields.label: Max Concurrency
fields.description: Maximum number of concurrent operations the agent can run.

fields.name: enableAutoScaling
fields.label: Auto-Scaling Enabled
fields.description: Whether this agent can spawn additional worker processes.

fields.name: scalingThreshold
fields.label: Auto-Scaling Threshold (%)
fields.description: CPU usage threshold that triggers additional agent processes.

fields.name: version
fields.label: OS Version
fields.description: Distribution and version of the Unix environment.

fields.name: hasRootAccess
fields.label: Root Access?
fields.description: If true, the agent can run commands with root privileges.

fields.name: packages
fields.label: Installed Packages
fields.description: List of additional packages available in the environment.

fields.name: firewallEnabled
fields.label: Firewall Enabled
fields.description: Toggle whether a built-in firewall is active.

fields.name: allowedServices
fields.label: Allowed Services
fields.description: Firewall exceptions for specific inbound/outbound services.

fields.name: timezone
fields.label: System Timezone
fields.description: Sets the systemâ€™s default timezone (e.g., UTC, PST).

fields.name: maxProcesses
fields.label: Max Processes
fields.description: Limits the number of concurrent processes the system can spawn.

fields.name: userManagement
fields.label: User Management
fields.description: JSON or YAML specifying default user, home directories, etc.

fields.name: endpoint
fields.label: Endpoint URL
fields.description: Target API base URL or endpoint.

fields.name: method
fields.label: HTTP Method
fields.description: GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, etc.

fields.name: headers
fields.label: Headers
fields.description: JSON object for request headers.

fields.name: authType
fields.label: Auth Type
fields.description: none, bearer, basic, or custom method.

fields.name: authToken
fields.label: Auth Token
fields.description: Token or credentials used for authentication.

fields.name: timeoutSeconds
fields.label: Timeout (s)
fields.description: Max time to wait before request is aborted.

fields.name: retryCount
fields.label: Retry Attempts
fields.description: Number of times to retry a failed request.

fields.name: rateLimitPerMinute
fields.label: Rate Limit (req/min)
fields.description: Maximum requests per minute.

fields.name: indexName
fields.label: Index Name
fields.description: Logical name of the vector index.

fields.name: dimension
fields.label: Dimensions
fields.description: Size of the embedding vector (e.g., 1536).

fields.name: approximateSearch
fields.label: Approximate Search?
fields.description: If true, uses approximate nearest-neighbor for speed.

fields.name: shardCount
fields.label: Shard Count
fields.description: How many shards the DB is split into.

fields.name: replicationFactor
fields.label: Replication Factor
fields.description: Number of replicas for data redundancy.

fields.name: distanceMetric
fields.label: Distance Metric
fields.description: cosine, dot_product, euclidean, etc.

fields.name: cacheQueries
fields.label: Cache Queries?
fields.description: Caches repeated queries in memory for speed.

fields.name: modelName
fields.label: Model Name
fields.description: Identifier for the ML model architecture.

fields.name: maxTokens
fields.label: Max Tokens
fields.description: Maximum tokens to generate or process at once.

fields.name: temperature
fields.label: Temperature
fields.description: Randomness factor in generation.

fields.name: topP
fields.label: Top P
fields.description: Controls nucleus sampling for the output generation.

fields.name: beamSearch
fields.label: Use Beam Search?
fields.description: If true, uses beam search decoding instead of sampling.

fields.name: useGPU
fields.label: Use GPU?
fields.description: Enables GPU acceleration if available.

fields.name: functionName
fields.label: Function Name
fields.description: Unique identifier for this sub-function.

fields.name: concurrency
fields.label: Concurrency
fields.description: Number of parallel executions allowed.

fields.name: enableLogging
fields.label: Logging Enabled
fields.description: Toggle debug/trace logging for this function.

fields.name: timeoutMs
fields.label: Timeout (ms)
fields.description: Maximum execution time before the sub-function is aborted.

fields.name: contextSharing
fields.label: Context Sharing
fields.description: If true, shares memory or state with the parent agent.

fields.name: allowedDomains
fields.label: Allowed Domains
fields.description: List of domains or IPs allowed for network calls.

fields.name: useTLS
fields.label: Use TLS
fields.description: Whether secure TLS/SSL connections are required.

fields.name: portRestrictions
fields.label: Port Restrictions
fields.description: List of ports that are open or restricted.

fields.name: proxyEnabled
fields.label: Proxy Enabled
fields.description: If true, all traffic goes through the specified proxy.

fields.name: proxyURL
fields.label: Proxy URL
fields.description: If proxy is enabled, the URL or IP of the proxy server.

fields.name: timeoutSeconds
fields.label: Timeout (s)
fields.description: Max time for any network request before failure.

fields.name: folderPath
fields.label: Folder Path
fields.description: Root directory where files are stored.

fields.name: maxSizeMB
fields.label: Max Size (MB)
fields.description: Maximum capacity for this storage location.

fields.name: storageType
fields.label: Storage Type
fields.description: local, cloud, distributed, etc.

fields.name: encryptionEnabled
fields.label: Encrypt Files?
fields.description: If true, all data is written with encryption at rest.

fields.name: retentionDays
fields.label: Retention (days)
fields.description: How many days to keep files before deletion or archiving.

fields.name: filePermissions
fields.label: File Permissions
fields.description: Default Unix-like permissions for newly stored files.

fields.name: threatLevel
fields.label: Threat Level
fields.description: low, medium, high for the current environment risk.

fields.name: blockUnauthorized
fields.label: Block Unauthorized
fields.description: Deny or discard unknown/untrusted data payloads.

fields.name: quarantineSuspicious
fields.label: Quarantine Suspicious?
fields.description: Isolate suspicious data for later inspection.

fields.name: scanMode
fields.label: Scan Mode
fields.description: signature, heuristic, or AI-based scanning approach.

fields.name: scanDepth
fields.label: Scan Depth
fields.description: How many nested levels to inspect in inbound data.

fields.name: persona
fields.label: Bot Persona
fields.description: friendly, formal, snarky, etc.

fields.name: language
fields.label: Language
fields.description: Primary language for responses.

fields.name: useEmojis
fields.label: Use Emojis?
fields.description: Enables emojis in textual responses.

fields.name: autoTranslate
fields.label: Auto-Translate?
fields.description: Translate user messages to the default language if needed.

fields.name: maxResponseLength
fields.label: Max Response Length
fields.description: Limit on the number of characters in a single reply.

fields.name: typingDelayMs
fields.label: Typing Delay (ms)
fields.description: Simulates typing delay before sending a response.
